name: parallel-editor
description: Edit component’s parts(tamplate/script/style) use 3 columns view, It’s layout looks like CodePen/JSFiddle/JSBin, used for Angular components, Vue TypeScript components or other mvc/mvvm components which itself’s templates/scripts/styles parts each as single file wrappered with in the same folder.
author: Colin <mail@luozhihua.com>

parallel.cacheDirectory.description: A directory under the current VSCode Workspace use for saving Parallel Editor's cache files, temp files.

parallel.scriptExtnames.description: A set of extnames used for detect component's script file, The extnames you setted will be merged into the built-ins and deduplicated, built-in script extnames: ['.js', '.jsx', '.ts', '.tsx', '.mjs', '.es', '.es6', '.coffee', '.dart'].

parallel.styleExtnames.description: A set of extnames used for detect component's style file, The extnames you setted will be merged into the built-ins and deduplicated, built-in style extnames: ['.css', '.scss', '.sass', '.less', '.styl', '.stylus'].

parallel.templateExtnames.description: A set of extnames used for detect component's template file, The extnames you setted will be merged into the built-ins and deduplicated, built-in template extnames: ['.jade', '.pug', '.tpl', '.html', '.htm', '.xhtml', '.xml', '.mustache', '.ejs', '.def', '.dot', '.jst', '.handlebars', '.hbs', '.haml', '.dust', '.njk'].

parallel.columnsOrder.description: Adjust script, template, style panels layout order in the editor.

parallel.includeDirectories.description: Only enable multipe column edit for those paths and sub paths.
